name: NPR
text: In an interview with NPR on Sunday, John Bolton said Trump frequently spoke with Chinese leader Xi Jinping about his reelection prospects. https://t.co/g0MOltzhA3

name: NPR
text: “I am just so happy that I have lived long enough to witness this moment,” activist Angela Davis tells @hereandnow. “And I think that I see myself as witnessing this moment for all of those who lost their lives in the struggle over the decades.” https://t.co/jH8qmXhYje

name: NPR
text: Kimberlé Crenshaw and the African American Policy Forum started the #SayHerName campaign to bring awareness to the names of Black women who have been targets of police brutality and violence. @hereandnow https://t.co/W85bZNjKwq

name: NPR
text: Commentary: "While it’s easier to ascribe racism to the heinous actions of a Derek Chauvin or even Amy Cooper, there are many ways to be complicit as sponsors or beneficiaries of unjust structures," writes @tmuguwe. @cogwbur https://t.co/Ds00DDYoaL
